title: Mince pies
description: Make your own mincemeat and you won’t be disappointed. Add a grating of orange zest to your pastry for a unique flavour.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz dark brown soft sugar or muscovado sugar
1 Bramley apple, peeled, grated, core discarded
350g/12oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
150g/5½oz unsalted butter, softened, cut into cubes
